title: Pepi Hospital: Learn & Care
description: Pepi Hospital Learn & Care is an engaging casual game for kids where you can play as a doctor, patient, or explorer. Dive into a colorful hospital environment featuring everything from X-ray rooms to dental clinics. Assist the Pepi characters, operate medical tools, and interact with numerous objects. Meet various characters, including the helpful Pepi Bot, and embark on an educational adventure that teaches fundamental medical concepts.
